comments.body: If I have a collection in my install path that doesn't have a MANIFEST.json or galaxy.yml and try to install an unrelated collection, I get `ERROR! Failed to find the collection dir deps: The collection galaxy.yml path '/home/fedora/ansible/test_collections/ansible_collections/test/coll/galaxy.yml' does not exist.` We could probably just determine the namespace and name from the path, and the version would be "*" and no dependencies.
Could you add an integration test for that in a PR so I could attempt to see what state it is in, in runtime?
